synopsis.text:
The stage is set in the heart of Victorian England, where Ray, a prodigious young inventor, finds his world upturned by the arrival of a mysterious parcel from his grandfather, Lloyd Steam, residing in the United States. Inside lies the Steam Ball, an extraordinary device capable of powering any steam-driven machinery with an almost infinite energy supply. However, this groundbreaking invention carries a hidden menace, making it a highly coveted object by the ruthless O'Hara Foundation, intent on exploiting its power for their sinister ambitions.

As preparations for the first-ever Great Exhibition unfold, Ray is thrust into a high-stakes game of cat and mouse, evading the relentless pursuit of the O'Hara Foundation's minions. With the fate of the Steam Ball hanging in the balance, Ray must summon all his ingenuity to safeguard the device from falling into the wrong hands. The ensuing struggle transcends a mere battle of wits, becoming a crusade for redemption and the future of mankind.
